snippet: Jasper Johns talks about his work with Merce Cunningham, both stars of the exhibition “Dancing Around the Bride,” at the Philadelphia Museum of Art.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay offers highlights from his interview with artist Jasper Johns about his longtime collaboration with choreographer Merce Cunningham; both artists are among those featured in exhibit Dancing Around the Bride at Philadelphia Museum of Art.
lead_paragraph: Jasper Johns talks about his work with Merce Cunningham, both stars of the exhibition “Dancing Around the Bride,” at the Philadelphia Museum of Art.

headline.seo: Jasper Johns Speaks of Merce Cunningham
headline.main: Cunningham and Johns: Rare Glimpses Into a Collaboration
headline.print_headline: Cunningham and Johns: Rare Glimpses Into a Collaboration
